markdownRemark.html:
It got me at the first line:

"iDon't allow open development."

This is a commercial for a new phone called the Droid.

UPDATE: Apparently the Droid is a new phone powered by Android from Google. Its going to be on the Verizon Network which is totally ironic, because Verizon Wireless has a terrible track record for openness. They actually had a phone which was fairly open, and changed the operating system to force customers to have to use their network to download pictures! (See this and this for more information on the e815.)

frontmatter.title: iDon t Believe its Not Butter
